attributes.action: Everyone That Has Gone Into Voluntary Education Should Recieve £15-£20 EMA
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have gone into further educaion but do not recieve EMA as my parents earn above the limit to recieve it. Many students that go to the 6th form that i am studying at, also do not recieve EMA, we all think that people who choose to study in further education believe that we should recieve some money as EMA (£15 - £20) This would help most of the students as it is very hard to find jobs with the current recession that is taking place.
